formattedAddress: 345 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 345 W Broadway, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: Wonderful Experience!!  Everything from the greeting, the offer of a beverage, cleanliness, professionalism is spot on.   Justin is a true master of his craft.   Took his time to make everything perfect, never felt rushed, very relaxing. Also is a perfect gentleman!!  Would definitely recommend!!

text.text: Wonderful Experience!!  Everything from the greeting, the offer of a beverage, cleanliness, professionalism is spot on.   Justin is a true master of his craft.   Took his time to make everything perfect, never felt rushed, very relaxing. Also is a perfect gentleman!!  Would definitely recommend!!

originalText.text: I have been to dozens upon dozens of barber shops all over the city but this is the one i keep coming back to. This one is special because they specialize in thinning hair. They boast many services for hair loss but I come here for their thoughtful and careful hair cutting. In my opinion, the less hair you have, the more talented a barber must be. A bad haircut on thinning hair could easily be disastrous. I trust these barbers to do a consistently great job. They also give a fine and close straight edge shave. It’s not cheap cheap but , for what you get, it’s a total bargain. No rushing here. Stunning shop, impeccably designed and spotless. Warm staff. Ask for a coffee while you wait. All and all, a wonderful experience.

originalText.text: Being part of the Barber Surgeons Guild family feels like joining a crew of talented friends. The positive vibes are contagious, especially when you witness the joy of clients who've had successful transplants. From precise haircuts to creative beard trims and the artistry of scalp camo, it's amazing to see how our team's skills bring smiles to our clients' faces. Proud to be part of a team that not only styles hair but boosts confidence and happiness!!

Proud to be part of a team that not only styles hair but boosts confidence and happiness!!

originalText.text: Visiting Justin for my haircut is always a highlight. He’s able to engage in a range of conversations and relates to people so easily. Every time I’m there, he remembers the key milestones that either just passed, or are coming up, in my life, asks about my family, and finds a point of connection. The actual product of the haircut is constantly 10/10, with him taking particular care and attention to what makes you feel good as an individual. His professionalism and mastery of his craft shows through each time, and you walk out feeling confident about your style and appearance. Absolute top person, and would recommend to anyone!

originalText.text:
Top notch quality of service, and I've never once had a bad interaction with any of the staff. Had my haircut from Sarah who's honestly a bit of a rockstar. Understood my hair and gave me exactly what I wanted and completed it in a flash.

This place seems to also double as cafe, as they serve coffee, tea, coldbrew and even beer and whisky for no charge to their clients! Highly highly recommended.
